CatDescriptText: Children are possibly coming from Baxter School.  Goode Pharmacy was located at 7647 Frankstown Avenue, Homewood. The Goode family car is parked first on street.
TitMainTitle: Crossing guard watching children cross at corner of Frankstown and Brushton Avenue with Goode Pharmacy
